text: Three Wonderful Days (German: Drei wunderschöne Tage) is a 1939 German drama film directed by Fritz Kirchhoff and starring Gustav Waldau, Gina Falckenberg and Hans Zesch-Ballot.Parish p.256 ==Cast== * Gustav Waldau * Gina Falckenberg * Hans Zesch-Ballot * Walter Janssen * Anni Markart * Werner Scharf * Willem Holsboer * Gundel Thormann * Josef Eichheim * Elise Aulinger * Hans Richter * Otto Wernicke * Albert Janschek * Herbert Hübner * O.E. Hasse * Maria Pierenkaemper * Maria Stadler * Hans Schulz * Fritz Reiff * Julius Riedmueller * Adolf Lallinger * Eva Schmid-Kayser * Ina Albrecht * Josef Berger * Eduard Mathes-Roeckel * Walter Hillbring * Erika Stauffenberg == References == == Bibliography == * Parish, James Robert. Film Actors Guide. Scarecrow Press, 1977. == External links == * Category:1939 films Category:German films Category:Films of Nazi Germany Category:German drama films Category:1939 drama films Category:German-language films Category:Films directed by Fritz Kirchhoff Category:Bavaria Film films Category:German black-and-white films
title: Three Wonderful Days
